help-file.title: "SONG OF REVELATION"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of singer Type of song: Divination
"Song of revelation" allows those in the room to better detect auras around them. As the bard increases in skill, so does the song, allowing those in the room to detect invisibility, the presence of life, and farsight.
